app.requests.call_smoothcomp.get_webpage_data(event_id, page_number)¶

Simple request to smoothcomp website with event_id and page_number

Parameters:

  • event_id – BJJ Competition ID

  • page_number – Page number of matches to call

Returns:

Parsed HTML

app.utils.try_parse_int.try_parse_int(value)¶

If input is INT, return value as INT, else return 0 (Zero)

Parameters:

value – Any given input

Returns:

INT
